mapper.sql: t.f_id AS id, t.f_record_id AS recordId, t.f_file_id AS fileId, t.f_isdeleted AS isdeleted, t.f_update_time AS updateTime, t.f_create_time AS createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM t_conference_file t where t.f_isdeleted=0
ORDER BY t.f_update_time DESC

SELECT , f.f_name as `name`, f.f_ext as ext, f.f_type as `type`, f.f_size as `size` FROM t_conference_file t left join t_file f on f.f_id = t.f_file_id where t.f_isdeleted=0 and t.f_record_id = #{recordId}
